executiveSummary: Flated founders Ken Hovy, Monique Kefir, and Ryan Gay presented their innovative inflatable vehicle accessories on Shark Tank, seeking $350,000 for 5% equity. After extensive discussion on valuation, sales, and business commitment, they accepted Damon John’s offer of $350,000 for an 8% royalty per unit sold, which drops to 5% after repayment.
keyDecisions: Flated accepted Damon John’s royalty-based investment offer of $350,000 for an 8% royalty, decreasing to 5% after repayment.

actionItems.task: Work with Damon John to formalize investment agreement and integrate his guidance for business growth.
actionItems.assignee: Ken Hovy, Monique Kefir, Ryan Gay

actionItems.task: Increase production capacity to fulfill retailer purchase orders and meet projected sales targets.
Expand marketing efforts to build customer trust, including participation in hunting, camping, and outdoor shows.

nextSteps: The Flated team will collaborate with Damon John to scale operations, manage cash flow, and enhance marketing to drive national sales and retailer partnerships.
